page.title: 04Games we Play
page.content: When it is playtime we sometimes play {'twang'}or{'Hot-rice'}.When you play {Hot-rice}you try to hit the person's legs with a ball but if it hits the top of your leg you are not out,but if it hits between your foot and your knee you are out. You play{Hot-rice}with a small ball like a tennis ball. Quite a lot of girls are keen on{ {Twang}.All you need is some elastic and tie a Knot in the ends and then two people stand at each end.The first person stands at the side and puts their right foot into the middle of the elastic,then their left foot and take their right foot to the right side of the twang.Many girls have twangs because it is a popular game.
